        trackPortalSessions - if set, track the relationship between portal sessions and portelt ids

        Like FreeMarkerPortlet(Channel, boolean), but supports the specification of channel replacements.

        Parameters:

        channelReplacements - the channel replacements (see Component)
        trackPortalSessions - if set, track the relationship between portal sessions and portelt ids

    • Method Detail

      • freemarkerConfig

        protected freemarker.template.Configuration freemarkerConfig()

        Create the base freemarker configuration.

        Returns:
        the configuration

      • fmTypeModel

        protected Map<String,Object> fmTypeModel(RenderSupport renderSupport)

        Creates the request independent part of the freemarker model. The result is cached as unmodifiable map as it can safely be assumed that the render support does not change for a given portal.

        This model provides:

        • The function portletResource that makes RenderSupport.portletResource(String, java.net.URI) available in the template. The first argument is set to the name of the portlet, only the second must be supplied when the function is invoked in a template.
        Parameters:
        renderSupport - the render support from the portal
        Returns:
        the result

      • fmSessionModel

        protected Map<String,Object> fmSessionModel(org.jgrapes.http.Session session)

        Build a freemarker model holding the information associated with the session.

        This model provides:

        • The locale (of type Locale).
        • The resourceBundle (of type ResourceBundle).
        • A function _ that looks up the given key in the portlet’s resource bundle.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the model

      • fmPortletModel

        protected Map<String,Object> fmPortletModel(RenderPortletRequestBase<?> event,
                                            org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel channel,
                                            AbstractPortlet.PortletBaseModel portletModel)

        Build a freemarker model for the current request.

        This model provides:

        • The event property (of type RenderPortletRequest).
        • The portlet property (of type AbstractPortlet.PortletBaseModel).
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        channel - the channel
        portletModel - the portlet model
        Returns:
        the model

      • fmModel

        protected Map<String,Object> fmModel(RenderPortletRequestBase<?> event,
                                     PortalSession channel,
                                     AbstractPortlet.PortletBaseModel portletModel)

        Build a freemarker model that combines fmTypeModel(org.jgrapes.portal.base.RenderSupport), fmSessionModel(org.jgrapes.http.Session) and fmPortletModel(org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.RenderPortletRequestBase<?>, org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel, org.jgrapes.portal.base.AbstractPortlet.PortletBaseModel).

        Parameters:
        event - the event
        channel - the channel
        portletModel - the portlet model
        Returns:
        the model

      • doGetResource

        protected void doGetResource(PortletResourceRequest event,
                             org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel channel)

        Checks if the path of the requested resource ends with *.ftl.*. If so, processes the template with the fmTypeModel(RenderSupport) and fmSessionModel(Session) and sends the result. Else, invoke the super class’ method.

        Overrides:
        doGetResource in class AbstractPortlet
        Parameters:
        event - the event. The result will be set to true on success
        channel - the channel
